TopicTitle: 30 min - 1hr to load the loading screen in ksp....

Articles.Content:
I wanted to play ksp today but the problem was trying to get past the loading screen which would take so damn long. This time with no mods either. I reinstalled ksp and yet it still has the same problem. It gets stuck in "Loading Asset Bundle Definitions" for 15minutes or so. I just don't know what to do...

I have not encountered this kind of problem. Usually even my ksp with 80mods+ would load only 10 minutes.

Do you use Hamachi or a similar simulated network connection?

Unity (the engine KSP uses) has a problem with unused network connections. Disabling Hamachi fixes it.

6 hours ago, OrtwinS said:

Do you use Hamachi or a similar simulated network connection?

Unity (the engine KSP uses) has a problem with unused network connections. Disabling Hamachi fixes it.

I'll check that out, thanks for advice. 

[Edit] AMAZING! LOL! Put hamachi offline now my ksp loads in 1minute! Thank you! XD You sir made my day!

Edited July 5, 2016 by Jeric
